column1: Little Goat Diner////We had a late lunch on a Thursday afternoon. The place is very cute with kind of a hipster vibe. The menu is large and varied. My hisband had the beef noodle salad
column2: which he enjoyed. I had the Fattoush
column3: kind of a Mediterranean thing. It was good
column4: but undoubtedly the strangest salad I've ever eaten due to the quinoa sprinkled liberally through the entire salad. Â It gave everything a seedy texture. Despite this
